title: Stomacher, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Stomacher with a trefoil point at the bottom, solidly embroidered in silver thread with a symmetrical design a flowers framed by two coiled ribbon forms.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource
